divs: Sighting DetailsI was parking my truck and getting out, looking around as one does. I saw it come from behind my friends house and slowly travel over me before disappearing. I couldn't see anymore because of trees. It was a ball of light, seemed kind of like a fireball tht was flying slowly above me. It was hovering when I first noticed it. I thought maybe it was something burning flying as it was sort of windy tht night, but it was too big to be paper or anything. I asked my friends a few mins later as it would have hovered right over them but they hasn't seen anything.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Elkhorn
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Ball of light traveled over me
